title: Turmeric Salmon with Lentils & Greens
method: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Heat coconut oil in an ovenproof pan over medium heat.
Add onion and cook 5 minutes until softened.
Add garlic, turmeric and cumin; cook 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add organic chicken thigh and cook until lightly coloured.
Add vegetables and lentils, stir to combine.
Transfer to oven and bake 20 minutes until cooked through.
plating: Serve in a warm shallow bowl.
Finish with fresh herbs and a drizzle of the cooking oil.
notes: Uses olive oil, coconut oil, or avocado oil only. No seed oils.

supports.cortisol: High fibre, balanced protein and anti-inflammatory spices help moderate cortisol response.
supports.blood_sugar: Aligned with Diabetes UK guidance: fibre ≥10g, low GI ingredients, no refined sugar.
supports.inflammation: Turmeric, cumin, and non-seed oils support reduced systemic inflammation.

diabetesUK.notes: Diabetes-friendly tagging aligned with Diabetes UK guidance when portioned appropriately.

hormoneSupport.notes: Supports hormone balance via fibre, stable blood sugar, healthy fats, and anti-inflammatory ingredients.
